aws_athena_named_query.description: Provides an Athena Named Query resource.

name.description: The plain language name for the query. Maximum length of 128.

workgroup.description: The workgroup to which the query belongs. Defaults to `primary`

database.description: The database to which the query belongs.

query.description: The text of the query itself. In other words, all query statements. Maximum length of 262144.

description.description: A brief explanation of the query. Maximum length of 1024.

id.description: The unique ID of the query.
